mapper.sql: id, name, url, sort, parentId, enable, creater, created, modifier, modified, icon, type, permission
mapper.select: select count(1) from sys_permission where type=0

select
from sys_permission where type=0
and parentId=0

select
from sys_permission where type=0 and enable=1 order by sort desc
mapper.insert: insert into sys_permission (id, name, url, sort, parentId, enable, creater, created, modifier, modified, icon, type, permission) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT}, #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=BIT}, #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

id,
name,
url,
sort,
parentId,

mapper.update:
update sys_permission
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=TINYINT},
parentId = #{parentid,jdbcType=INTEGER},
enable = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT},
creater = #{creater,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifier = #{modifier,jdbcType=INTEGER},
modified = #{modified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=BIT},
permission = #{permission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
